Grading Rubric for {assignment}

Excellent (A): Demonstrates thorough understanding, original thinking, and clear communication. All requirements are met or exceeded.

Proficient (B): Shows solid understanding with minor gaps. Requirements are met with competent execution.

Developing (C): Demonstrates basic understanding but lacks depth or clarity in key areas. Some requirements may be partially met.

Beginning (D/F): Shows limited understanding of the material. Significant requirements are missing or incomplete.

Please review this rubric before submitting your work. It's designed to help you understand exactly what's expected.

Hi {name}, just a reminder about our late work policy for {course}. Assignments submitted after the due date will receive a deduction of one letter grade per day, up to three days late. After three days, late submissions will not be accepted without prior approval.

If you're facing circumstances that may affect your ability to submit on time, please reach out to me as soon as possible. I'd rather work with you on a plan than have you miss credit entirely.
